name: mapBoxRegion
description:
mapbox plugins,
                    MapBoxLoadGeometryAdapter   Dynamic Action - load geometry into map region
                    MapBoxZoomToAdapter         Dynamic Action - zoom level dy. action control
                    mapBoxIncludeAPI            Item           - API key item
                    mapBoxRegion                Region plugin  - map region
                   for more info => https://github.com/isabolic/apex-plugins/
